### Paint and Vehicle Body Repair Standing Offer Solicitation
#### Number and Reference

* Solicitation Number: WS4106893168
* Reference Number: WS4106893168-Doc4106971671

#### Publication and Closing Dates

* Publication Date: July 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 11, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton, has a requirement for a Paint and Vehicle Body Repair Service. The service includes the supply of labour, parts, and materials to perform bodywork repair, paint, sandblast, and soda blast for various commercial vehicles, Standard Military Pattern (SMP) vehicles, boats, and heavy off-road equipment. This service will be provided on an "as-and-when-requested" basis during a 3-year Standing Offer period from the date of award.

#### Requirements and Specifications

The Service will be expected to meet the following requirements:

* Provide labour, parts, and materials for various commercial vehicles, Standard Military Pattern (SMP) vehicles, boats, and heavy off-road equipment
* Perform bodywork repair, paint, sandblast, and soda blast services for these vehicles
* Provide the services on an "as-and-when-requested" basis during the Standing Offer period
